POORDERHDR.DESCRIPTN:
TEO Title: Ethernet VZW - SWTHFLXAO32 - MRMS Cards - UZVC TEO Description: INITIAL SUBMITTAL...DAVID MELENDEZ FOR CLIFF LEVERING...10/17/2014
FTTCS 2014 PROGRAM
What:
FIRM ORDER FOR TWO - 1 Gbps Ethernet (300 Mb) Ethernet VzON SERVICE FOR VERIZON WIRELESS. THIS WORK ORDER AUTHORIZES THE PURCHASE AND INSTALLATION OF TWO MRMS, TO THE EXISTING FW9500 AND ROADM SFP'S IN THE SWEETWATER CO.
Where:
CENTRAL OFFICE: SWEETWATER CO 7502 W HILLSBOROUGH AVE TAMPA, FL 33615
When:
Equipment In service date: 12/31/2014
Why:
THE INSTALLATION OF THE MRMS CARDS AND ROADM SFP'S ARE REQUIRED TO TRANSPORT THE TWO - 1 Gbps Ethernet (300 Mb) Ethernet VzON SERVICE FOR VERIZON WIRELESS. THE ADDITION OF THIS MATERIAL IS THE LEAST COST SOLUTION TO MEET THE CURRENT AND FUTURE SERVICE DEMANDS AT THIS CO.
Why now:
THE ADDITION OF THE MRMS CARDS AND ROADM SFP'S ARE REQUIRED NOW TO MEET THE FIRM ORDER COMMITMENT FOR VZON ETHERNET SERVICE.
PCAT: UZVC CBS/CNE: 2014-742865 PROJECT IDENTIFICATION: FTTCS VzW Phase 2 Cell Sites
CLLI Code CO NODE: SWTHFLXA CLLI Code Cust NODE: SWTHFLXAO32 COEMOD #: N/A
Ring: Public Ring Type: UPSR Central Office: 1415 - SWEETWATER
WORK ORDER CONTACT NUMBERS:
NETWORK PLANNING ISP: MARCOS NAVIA 813-978-2221 NETWORK PLANNER OSP: Bob Edwards 813-978-2353 TRANSMISSION ENGINEERING: TBD PROJECT MANAGER: Matthew Hall 813-978-5069
Associated Work orders: N/A
Engineering Requirements:
1. Engineer the addition of two (2) MRMS cards M/C FC9565CMD1, sixteen (16) SFP M/C FC95700170 (install in G5/6-1-8). Also, add two ROADM SFP M/C 81.SOC48SR1131S.
2. Spares: no
(a) Engineer: On Ring Drawing, please include the following information:
* Indicate Ring is public * In Engineering notes: indicate any special access issues.
3. Central Office Requirements:
(a) MRMS cards to be installed in the following FW9500 system:
CLLI Code: SWTHFLXAO32 BAY: 0112010 MTG: 32 Slot: G05/G06
(b) ROADM SFP to be added in the following ROADM system:
CLLI Code: SWTHFLXAO27 BAY: MHN-2303 MTG: 09 PS: 02 Slot: G08/G09 Port: 3
4. Create a new OC-48 link, FNI FL1HM - SWTHFLXAO32/SWTHFLXAO27.
5. Notify planner if any changes are made to this CCR.
POORDERHDR.NOTES: Mark all packages with 'TEO:W000724611' and item number (Provide shipping papers). ****Inside Delivery Required****
